title: Real Doors - Sounds Effects
description: Make your game experience to another level with this doors! :D
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


By purchasing this package you will have access to over 300 audio files related to doors and windows. There are creaking doors, metal doors, gates, windows, knocks, among many others. And even a Sci-fi Door as Bonus for you.


The interesting thing about this package is that it contains a folder called "Mockup_files" in it you can assemble hundreds of sound effects for different situations, for example, there is a folder only with squeaks, which can be used for a hanging object, a door, a window, among others. many others.


I'm sure this patch will be useful to you In alot of different areas.


And it's worth remembering that by investing in this pack you take all that and still help me to continue creating quality sound effects at a nice price for the community! :D


Check the preview

Check the Documentation

This bundle is now part of this Bundle:

Horror Bundle - Sound Effects in Sound Effects - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)


Don't worry! This package will still receive updates :)
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 311

Number of Audio Cues: 311

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
